org.apache.river.outrigger

Interface StorableObject<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the object to be restored
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    StorableResource<T>

    public interface StorableObject<T>
    Interface that must be implemented by objects that must persist their state.
    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Sun Microsystems, Inc.
    See Also:
    LogOps

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T restore(ObjectInputStream in)
      Restore the persistent fields and return new instance.
      void store(ObjectOutputStream out)
      Store the persistent fields

    • Method Detail

      • store

        void store(ObjectOutputStream out)
    throws IOException
        Store the persistent fields
        Parameters:
        out - ObjectOutputStream in which to store the object.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an IO related exception occurs.

      • restore

        T restore(ObjectInputStream in)
   throws IOException,
          ClassNotFoundException
        Restore the persistent fields and return new instance.
        Parameters:
        in - ObjectInputStream from which to read the object.
        Returns:
        new object instance.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an IO related exception occurs.
        ClassNotFoundException - if class of object is not found.
